body:
Hey everyone,

For the past year or so, I have found numerous channels with extremely interesting facts and perspectives. These channels are mostly large (so you may know of them), but I think it would be a good idea to post some of the ones I found here. Hopefully you guys could help expand my knowledge by posting links to interesting (nothing purely comedic or stupid) youtube channels here. 

Thank you,
Max

Numberphile: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoxcjq-8xIDTYp3uz647V5A
CPHGrey: https://avicus.net/forums/new?utf8=✓&topic_id=45 (My Personal Favorite)
Vsauce: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6nSFpj9HTCZ5t-N3Rm3-HA
MinutePhysics: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUHW94eEFW7hkUMVaZz4eDg
MinuteEarth: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeiYXex_fwgYDonaTcSIk6w
Veritasium: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHnyfMqiRRG1u-2MsSQLbXA
In a Nutshell - Kurzgesagt: https://www.youtube.com/user/Kurzgesagt
TED-Ed: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsooa4yRKGN_zEE8iknghZA
Zefrank: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVpankR4HtoAVtYnFDUieYA (Hysterical yet interesting)

title: Interesting YouTube Channels

replies.body:
Hey Max, long time no see!

These are all very interesting channels. Many of which I have seen before, but lots of them are new to me. I'll be sure to check them out! Hope to keep in touch.

-Jake
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Max, long time no see!

These are all very interesting channels. Many of which I have seen before, but lots of them are new to me. I'll be sure to check them out! Hope to keep in touch.

-Jake

replies.body:
Channels I think would fit in this include:

AsapSCIENCE - https://youtube.com/AsapSCIENCE

and

Smarter Every Day - https://youtube.com/destinws2


But my personal favorite from your list is Kurzgesagt :D

I like VSauce, he's pretty cool.

Nice ass btw

replies.body:
Some of the other channels run by Brady Haran (guy who runs numberphile) are pretty interesting. My personal favourites are:

Sixty Symbols: https://www.youtube.com/user/sixtysymbols

Computerphile: https://www.youtube.com/user/Computerphile

replies.body: I love channels like these, especially Vsauce and CGPGrey but I wish they would upload more.
